Date: Saturday, 4/2/2070
Subject: Retirement
Dear Sir,
It's been a hard decision, but I think I will retire
after this season. It's time to let the youngsters
take my job.

Regards,
Brent Mcneill



Date: Sunday, 5/1/2070
Subject: Progress of Jesus Fernandez
Dear Sir,
Jesus Fernandez has nothing more to prove at AA Erie SeaWolves!
He has an AVG of .347 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director
